product_name: Lowepro Inverse 100 AW Beltpack Camera Case
long_description: The Lowepro Inverse 100 AW Beltpack camera case has an array of thoughtful features to help you capture the moment with ease while carrying your camera in comfort. Main compartment with adjustable divider holds a DSLR with a medium zoom lens attached, plus 1 additional lens or flash unit; smaller pockets hold a charger, cords and filters. Quick-access top lets you work out of the beltpack with minimal effort. Built-in AW Cover(TM) helps protect against rain, dust and sand; plus, it stows away in its own pocket. Contoured mesh lumbar belt distributes weight evenly and wicks away moisture. Detachable, padded shoulder strap offers a second carry option. Memory card pockets, adjustable divider, mesh side pockets and SlipLock(TM) attachment loops organize your gear.
short_description: The Lowepro Inverse 100 AW Beltpack camera case has an array of thoughtful features to help you capture the moment with ease while carrying your camera in comfort.
